metadata.title: CVE-2017-18594 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: nse_libssh2.cc in Nmap 7.70 is subject to a denial of service condition dueto a double free when an SSH connection fails, as demonstrated by a leading\n character to ssh-brute.nse or ssh-auth-methods.nse.

criterions.comment: nmap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
